process_section.title: How it works to create a unique biography
process_section.subtitle: Effortless creation with a guided 6-step process for the project initiator and contributors.

steps.title: Creating a space for the person to celebrate (free)
steps.description: Add their first name, date of birth, some personality traits, the tone of the book...

steps.title: Inviting loved ones to contribute (no limit)
steps.description: Family, friends, colleagues can share anecdotes, memories, photos...

steps.title: AI builds the biography (1st chapter offered)
steps.description: In just a few minutes, a first version is proposed to you. Moving, well-written, faithful.

steps.title: You review, correct, personalize
steps.description: Add details, modify chapters, change the tone... it's your book.

steps.title: Printing the unique book
steps.description: Professional layout, elegant binding and quality control.

steps.title: Book delivery
steps.description: Receive the book directly at home, ready to be offered as an unforgettable gift.

testimonials_section.title: What our customers say
testimonials_section.subtitle: Discover testimonials from those who offered a MyWai biographical book

testimonials.content: « For his 45th birthday, we wanted to do something really different. We gathered memories from his friends, school buddies, exes, even colleagues! The result: a funny, tender, touching book, completely in his image. He laughed, he cried, and he reread it three times in the week. »
testimonials.author: Elodie M.

testimonials.content: « On the day of his farewell party, we handed him the book in front of the whole team. He flipped through it, recognized the messages, the anecdotes... and he stopped cold. He had tears in his eyes. It's the kind of gift you don't forget. Even the most skeptical colleagues were amazed by the quality and sensitivity of the result. »
testimonials.author: Julien T.

testimonials.content: I gave this book to my mother for her 70th birthday. She shed tears of joy reading all the testimonials from her friends and family. It's a gift that will accompany her all her life.
testimonials.author: Marie L.

testimonials.content: The process is incredibly simple. The MyWai team did all the hard work, from coordinating contributions to editing. The result is beautifully laid out and very professional.
testimonials.author: Thomas B.

testimonials.content: I hesitated because of the price, but the quality of the book and the emotions it aroused are worth every penny. A truly unique gift that money can't normally buy.
testimonials.author: Sophie D.

testimonials.content: We created this book for our teacher who was retiring after 30 years of teaching. Seeing all the former students contribute with their memories was incredible, and he was deeply touched.
testimonials.author: Lucas M.
